author: wsjcom
title: On the Convergence of State Socialism and Capitalism
text:
Regarding Paul Kengor’s “Marx’s Apologists Should Be Red in the Face” (op-ed, May 4): The theory of communism is that the government takes money from the haves to help the have-nots; the reality is the government helps itself. In capitalistic America, four of the five richest counties surround Washington, D.C. If we were communists, it would be five.
Stephen Borkowski
...
